attributes.action: Ensure the BBC plays  Rule Britannia and Land of Hope And Glory at The Proms
attributes.additional_details: These songs are NOT racist they are traditional songs much loved by British people and Land of Hope and Glory was the song sung by the Far East  POWs as their alternative National Anthem When they were banned from singing, on pain of death by beheading, our actual National Anthem.  What an insult to their memory by the BBC in their flirtation with reverse racism And attempt to rewrite our history
attributes.background: The BBC’s proposed action insults  the memory,and Makes a mockery of all the deaths of thousands uponThousands of our men and women who fought And died in two World Wars to retain freedom for both this Country and the World.   The BBCs intents and actions make a mockery of their sacrifice.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the BBC Proms are a matter for BBC, which is operationally independent, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can read the BBC's announcement of the programme for the Last Night of the Proms here: https://www.pressparty.com/pg/newsdesk/BBC1/view/223541/
